data.title: Beyond The Olive
data.meta_description: California Extra Virgin Olive Oils, Small Batch Balsamic Vinegars. Tapenade and Gourmet products. California Olive Oil Council Certified (COOC), New York International Olive Oil Competition (NYIOOC) Gold Medal Winner, Community - local delivery, World-wide shipping.
data.text:
Beyond the Olive is a Southern California customer favorite and recognized as a premier reliable source for quality California Extra Virgin Olive Oil, vinegar and other delectable products.

As part of the Los Angeles artisan food movement we strive to not only contribute exceptional products, but also support other local food innovators.

Our values are simple: Integrity in everything we do, provide quality products and service with commitment to community, and build strong relationships.

Love the packaging and their quality. Just love everything I have tried so far and it is nice to have products from the USA that blindfolded would make most

think they came right from Italy. Marc • Massena, NY

You're my go-to for company gifts. Thanks for making me look good every year! - Jes

Delicious, garlic, stuffed olives. Really enjoyed all the products. The Smoky olive oil was flavorful and delicious - everything was! - Ryan • Ahwahnee, CA

Just a note to let you know how much I like your olive oil. Fruity and beautiful (and local) - Bill

Thank you so much for the delivery of my 3 gifts. I wanted to let you know that they were all Big hits! Just perfect to have something tasty which the recipient did not have to order themselves! - Virginia

Just wanted to drop you a note to say my evoo arrived ten minutes ago all safe and sound! ... Also- I think that’s the prettiest evoo delivery I ever got- thank you!!! Best wishes - Claire

In love with the oil & packaging! Kimberly • Los Angeles, CA

So delicious - All their products have become customer

favorites! Tj • Waldo, WI
